thread.title: an experience to remember
thread.title_full: an experience to remember - Review of EVEN Hotel Times Square South, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: vincyzhang
title: an experience to remember
text:
I stayed at this hotel for two days. I was welcomed with the best atmosphere. There was yoga mats provided in the rooms, filtered water and table tennis donwstairs that me and a friend fully made use of on our day of arrival as we were exhausted after our 20 hours flight. It was a refreshing and amazing experience find for hotel that's fitness themed. Totally worth the price and Definitely coming back.
Room Tip: Quiet rooms See more room tips
